title: Faladev #30 | The Importance of Contributing to Open Source
members: Diego Fernandes, João Pedro, Diego Haz, and Bruno Lemos
description:
In this episode of Faladev, Diego Fernandes joins João Pedro Schmitz, Bruno Lemos, and Diego Haz to discuss the importance of open-source contribution and the challenges within the community.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming world.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast.

members: Diego Fernandes, Dani Leão, Laura Beatris, and Rafael Camarda
description:

Market analysis, practical concepts, and challenges in adopting any development method. All of this in a dynamic and relevant conversation for our audience.

title: Faladev #28 | Behind Barriers and Solutions Proposed by Microservices
members: Diego Fernandes, Dani Leão, Wesley Williams, and Lucas Santos
description:
Developers Wesley Willians and Lucas Santos were invited to this Faladev to have a conversation about what microservices are and what the challenges and barriers are in their application.

In this edition, Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista guide the conversation by raising relevant topics and questions about the subject.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming world.

description:
Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista welcomed Otávio Lemos and Rodrigo Branas for a chat about modern development architectures applied in the technology industry.

What are the fundamentals, principles, and the importance of discussing architectures in this ecosystem?

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming world.

title: Faladev #26 | Special: Exclusive Interview with José Valim, Creator of the Elixir Language
description:
In this special end-of-season edition, we had the opportunity to have a conversation with José Valim, the Brazilian dev who created the Elixir programming language — used internationally in various technologies, including Discord and Pinterest.

The topic of the week revolved around various processes involved in creating a new language that proposes to be an efficient alternative in the technology market.

In addition to all this, Valim was able to talk about a lot of code and his journey and experience in creating an active community behind open source.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather three technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming world.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about various topics that matter to your dev career.

title: Faladev #25 | What is UX/UI?
members: Diego Fernandes, Tiago Luchtenberg, and Thainan Librelon
description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather three technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming world.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about various topics that matter to your dev career.

In this episode, Diego Fernandes joins Thainan Librelon and Tiago Luchtenberg to discuss: Can a developer do the work of UI/UX, what's the impact? When is the ideal time to have specialized people in UX and UI? And, after all, what is UI and what is UX?

title: Faladev #24 | How to Become a Development Leader?
members: Diego Fernandes, João Paulo, and Cleiton Souza
description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather three technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming world.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about various topics that matter to your dev career. In this episode, Diego Fernandes joins Cleiton Souza and João Paulo de Magalhães to discuss leadership, considering professional, technical, and even emotional aspects. What does it involve to be a development leader? After all, what is a development leader?

title: FalaDev #23 | What do Communities Have to Do with Technology?
members: Diego Fernandes, Isabela Castilho, and João Inácio
description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather three technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming world.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about various topics that matter to your dev career.

In this first episode of the new season, Diego Fernandes joins Isabela Castilho and João Inácio Neto (Biro) to discuss communities and the impact they have on the careers of devs aiming for the next level. After all, what is a community, and what does it have to do with technology?
